coreAtributes.name: Vintage Goggles
coreAtributes.description: A pair of old vintage goggles from the Victorian era.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s goggles and roughly pull them off [npc.her].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your goggles and roughly pulls them off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s goggles and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her].

replacementText.playerNPC: You slip the goggles onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull the goggles down over [npc.her] eyes.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips the goggles onto your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pulls the goggles over your eyes.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pulls the goggles down over [npc2.her] eyes.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s goggles and roughly pull them up.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your goggles and roughly pulls them up.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s goggles and roughly pulls them up.

replacementText.playerNPC: You pull the goggles down over [npc.her] eyes.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull the goggles down over [npc.her] eyes.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips the goggles back over your eyes.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pulls the goggles down over your eyes.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slips the goggles back over [npc2.name]'s eyes.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pulls the goggles down over [npc2.her] eyes.
